input.sentences: we were looking forward to skating .
afterwards we had soup to warm up .
and good music to listen to .
output.sentences: They wanted to go skating, but as they put on their skates they knew even skating forward would be difficult
Regardless, they were excited to give it a try
They had a great time, holding hands and trying not to fall down
after their adventure they wanted to warm up, so they had some soup
Later they relaxed and picked out some music to listen to
